IViewportPainter
public interface
IViewportPainter
GraphViewportPainter

Represents types that paint to a viewport.

Functions
Paint
void Paint(
Graphics g,
Rectangle viewportArea,
float zoomFactor
)

Paints onto the specified viewport.

Parameters
g
Graphics

The GDI+ drawing surface to paint on to.

viewportArea
Rectangle

The area to paint within.

zoomFactor
float

Zoom factor.
